description: Try our easy to follow Silverside With Herb Sauce And Warm Bean Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Silverside With Herb Sauce And Warm Bean Salad
name: Silverside With Herb Sauce And Warm Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice meat, then top with extra salsa verde. Serve with the warm bean salad and garnish with extra basil leaves.
